name: Binary
description: Input used to read binary files stored in a Hadoop-compatible monitored filesystem directory (that is: HDFS, S3, NFS, etc.)

properties.tooltip: Path to a file located in a compatible filesystem (HDFS, S3, Azure, etc). If the file is located in the HDFS used in the tenant configuration one can specify the path omitting the connection details.
Sets the parallelism value used by HDFS to process the file.
Name assigned to the output field generated
